title: Glasstaff Falls
summary: The party rescued Myrna Dendrar and her children from the prison cells, then discovered Glasstaff's wizard workshop. A letter sealed with a black spider revealed Glasstaff's true identity: Iarno Albrek, the Lord's Alliance agent who was supposed to protect Phandalin. A 20-round chase ensued as Glasstaff fled through the hideout, teleporting and casting shields. Kaelia ended it with a Twin-spelled Scorching Ray that punched a hole through his back, igniting him instantly. 'He doesn't even scream. The fire just robs him of his breath before it robs him of his life.' Double dead.

best_moments.title: Kaelia Incinerates Glasstaff
best_moments.description: After a 20-round chase, Glasstaff was running for his life, teleporting and casting shields. Kaelia's Twin-spelled Scorching Ray caught him—a streak of searing flame punched a hole through his back, igniting him instantly.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: A streak of searing flame just tears across the opening, brighter and hotter than the sun. It slams into his back, point blank, punching a hole through his robes, igniting him instantly.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: He doesn't even scream. The fire just robs him of his breath before it robs him of his life.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You did a little bit of overkill on him. He's double dead.

best_moments.title: Glasstaff's True Identity
best_moments.description: A letter sealed with a black spider symbol revealed that Glasstaff was actually Iarno Albrek—the Lord's Alliance agent Sildar had been searching for. He was supposed to protect Phandalin, not terrorize it.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You hear the name Iarno. And you've heard this before. When you rescued Sildar, he spoke of a fellow agent sent to Phandalin. He was meant to help establish order, but he vanished.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: The realization settles in. Iarno was supposed to come here to help protect Phandalin. You now see evidence that he is doing the opposite.

best_moments.title: Dendrar Family Rescued
best_moments.description: The party found Myrna Dendrar and her children in prison cells—the family of the woodcarver the Redbrands murdered. Darren Edermath escorted them back to town.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: There's a pair of human women held in a cell to the South. And there's a human boy confined in the cell to the North.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Myrna)
quotes.text: My name is Myrna. Myrna Dendrar. This is my daughter Nilsa. My son—he's in the other cell.

best_moments.title: The 20-Round Chase
best_moments.description: Glasstaff ran through the hideout, teleporting, casting shields, and blocking spells. The party pursued for 20 rounds—10 searching, 10 chasing.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: That was a well-earned kill, because we went through 20 rounds. 10 of them trying to find somebody, and 10 of them running.

quotes.speaker: Darren/Valrex
quotes.text: Dude, when you started using teleport, I said NO.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: I thought I was gonna be able to bounce off all those spells and teleport out of there.

best_moments.title: Staff of Defense Claimed
best_moments.description: From Glasstaff's ashes, Kaelia claimed the Staff of Defense—a glass staff as strong as oak with 10 charges for Mage Armor and Shield.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Untouched by flame is this glass staff. Delicate stylized feathers etched along the length, arcane sigils worked finely into it.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: As you grip it, you can feel the magic settle in. Defensive wards coiled and ready, waiting to be used.

best_moments.title: Phoenix Sorcerer Showcase
best_moments.description: The session showcased how powerful Kaelia's Phoenix Sorcerer build had become—Twin-spelled Scorching Ray with Mantle of Flame adding Charisma to each hit.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Twin-spelling a Scorching Ray, hitting six of those things on top of Mantle of Flame. This Phoenix Sorcerer is absolutely badass.

quotes.speaker: Jen/Kaelia
quotes.text: When I hit, I seem to hit pretty hard. When I'm out of spells, I'm a paper cannon.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: He doesn't even scream. The fire just robs him of his breath before it robs him of his life.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Darren/Valrex
quotes_of_the_session.quote: When you started using teleport, I said NO.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: This Phoenix Sorcerer is absolutely badass.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes_of_the_session.quote: He was supposed to protect Phandalin. Instead he terrorized it.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: That was a well-earned kill. We went through 20 rounds.

character_spotlights.moment: Found the prisoners, recognized the Tresendar crypts' history, contributed to the chase
character_spotlights.one_liner: Be well, brother. Get them to safety.

character_spotlights.one_liner: When you started using teleport, I said NO.

Found letter connecting Glasstaff to the Black Spider
